header.div: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: review what to expect at the start of the speaking test;
watch a video clip of a candidate giving personal information in Part 1 of the test;
look at a topic from Part 2 of the test and prepare what you would say;
watch a candidate doing the same topic for Phase 2 of the speaking test;
look at the follow up questions for this topic and watch the candidate answering them;
look at a summary of ways you can improve areas of your performance that you are not happy with.
